Plot: A homeless vigilante blows away crooked cops, pedophile Santas, and other scumbags with his trusty pump-action shotgun.
Title: Hobo with a Shotgun
Actors: Rutger Hauer, Pasha Ebrahimi, Robb Wells, Brian Downey
tomatoConsensus: It certainly isn't subtle -- or even terribly smart -- but as a gleefully gory homage to low-budget exploitation thrillers, Hobo with a Shotgun packs plenty of firepower.
